map_long_name: Measurement values precipitation, past 72 hours total
map_abstract: Current measurement values of Precipitation, 72 h total [mm]. Data is updated every hour. The data set contains all weather stations of the SwissMetNet, the automatic monitoring network of MeteoSwiss, which comprises 160 automatic monitoring stations. These stations deliver a multitude of current data on the weather and climate in Switzerland every ten minutes. The monitoring network is supplemented by around 140 automatic precipitation stations which enlarge the SwissMetNet to a total of 300 weather stations.
